result: You step in something damp sticky and green.
An angry green mass of ooze lurches towards you.
Within the ooze you notice a disconnected set of eyes locked on to you.
As you strike the finishing blow, whatever force was keeping the ooze together seems to unravel before you.
A foul smell fills the surrounding area and makes its way into your nose and lungs.
The stench is so overwhelming that you pass out
By the time you wake up there is no evidence of the gruesome battle.
At least the smell is gone
